sourcesContent:
<template>
   <v-row no-gutters class="fill-height">
    <v-col cols="8">
    <BlocklyComponent id="blockly1" :options="options" ref="block"/>
    </v-col>
    <v-col cols="4">
      <Statement index="id" ref="state"/>
    </v-col>
    </v-row>
</template>

<script>
import BlocklyComponent from './BlocklyComponent.vue'
import Statement from './Statement.vue'
ìmport statement from '!raw-loader!./assets/helloworld.txt'
import '../blocks/modulo';
import '../prompt';

///import BlocklyJS from 'blockly/javascript';

export default {
  name: 'Main',
  id: 0,
  components: {
    BlocklyComponent,
    Statement,
  },
  methods: {
    changeId: function(id) {
      this.id = id;
      this.$refs.state.props.index = id;
    },
  },
  data(){
    return {
      options: {
        media: 'media/',
        grid:
          {
            spacing: 25,
            length: 3,
            colour: '#ccc',
            snap: true
          },
        toolbox:
        `<xml>
          <category name="논리" colour="%{BKY_LOGIC_HUE}">
            <block type="logic_compare"></block>
            <block type="logic_operation"></block>
            <block type="logic_negate"></block>
            <block type="logic_boolean"></block>
          </category>
          <category name="제어" colour="%{BKY_LOOPS_HUE}">
            <block type="controls_if"></block>
            <block type="controls_repeat_ext">
              <value name="TIMES">
                <block type="math_number">
                  <field name="NUM">10</field>
                </block>
              </value>
            </block>
            <block type="controls_whileUntil"></block>
          </category>
          <category name="산술" colour="%{BKY_MATH_HUE}">
            <block type="math_number">
              <field name="NUM">123</field>
            </block>
            <block type="math_arithmetic"></block>
            <block type="math_single"></block>
            <block type="arithmetic_remainder"></block>
          </category>
          <category name="문자" colour="%{BKY_TEXTS_HUE}">
            <block type="text"></block>
            <block type="text_length"></block>
            <block type="text_print"></block>
          </category>
          <category name="변수" custom="VARIABLE" colour="%{BKY_VARIABLES_HUE}">
          </category>
        </xml>`
      }
    }
  },
  }
</script>

<style scoped>
#blockly1 {
  position: relative;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  z-index: 0;
}
</style>
